rationale: 'top' modifies 'states'. 'only 5.1 million' is a scale/metric. No intensifier/comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Ohio is also one of the top egg producing states but it [Ohio] has seen only 5.1 million birds killed because of bird flu.

rationale: Contains containment verb 'killed'. Q2 is overridden.
